ygData.subject: RE: Charisma and Dexterity
ygData.msgSnippet: ok so what happened after? =) would be VERY surprised and impressed if a 50 druid, 44 necro, and 37 bard can do the frenzies. Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf
ygData.messageBody:
ok so what happened after? =)

would be VERY surprised and impressed if a 50 druid, 44 necro, and 37 bard
can do the frenzies.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> A few nights ago,
> a 50 druid,
> 44 necro and myself (36 bard) went down to camp the frenzied
> by ourselves
> (I kinda forced my way into the group). As we were getting ready to
> assault the room, a wanderer walked up behind us. Immediately we were
> swarmed by 4 frogs we had invis'd our way passed. I thought
> the druid was
> going to evac, and since I didn't have screech mem'd (getting
> sooo hard to
> decide what to keep on tap), I started striking the mobs that
> were hitting
> him.
>
> The necro's pet probably got one of them close to dead before
> dying itself
> fairly early on in the fight. The two casters focussed on
> starfiring and
> draining one frog at a time, while I struck those yet
> untouched. All the
> frogs were red, and I was able to keep two down with very
> little damage
> being taken. When one frog remained standing, I kept it
> glazed over till
> the duo had enough mana to finish it off.
>
> I love being a bard.
>
> Athren
